plot outline: A story is taken from real life instances which occurs around a family and its surroundings that reveal, step by step, the twists, and turns in human thinking and behaviour. It attempts to portray the intrinsic nature of how human emotions like love, attachment, greed and passion shape and mold our thoughts and behaviour.
title: Mana Manthana
